Tezpur.title: Tezpur
Tezpur.byline: A city in Lower Assam, Tezpur (Assamese: তেজপুৰ Tejpur, Hindi: तेजपुर Tejpur) is the largest city in the northern banks of the Brahmaputra River.

Tezu.title: Tezu
Tezu.byline: Tezu is a census town of 18,184 people (2011) in Lohit District, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
